holidays.title: National Tequila Day
holidays.description: Is there any better way to enjoy some blue agave juice than bottoms up?

holidays.title: Amelia Earhart Day
holidays.description: Amelia Earhart is one of America’s most beloved pioneers in aviation.

holidays.title: Children's Day in Vanuatu
holidays.description: Children's Day in Vanuatu is held annually on July 24 to celebrate and protect children.

holidays.title: INTERNATIONAL SELF CARE DAY
holidays.description: As the foundation of wellness, self-care is emphasized and prioritized on International Self-Care Day.

holidays.title: National Day of Motoring
holidays.description: Vroom Vroom! Take your Mini for a drive and bask in the beauty of the open road.

holidays.title: National Drive-Thru Day
holidays.description: We may take it for granted but eating in our cars is a privilege.

holidays.title: National marine week
holidays.description: These two weeks highlight the amazing species found in the U.K.'s oceans.

holidays.title: National Thermal Engineer Day
holidays.description: You might not know it, but thermal energy is all around us.

holidays.title: Pioneer Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Pioneer Day by learning about the history related to it and much more.

holidays.title: Samaritans Awareness Day
holidays.description: Everybody deserves to be listened to and understood — it just takes the will to do so.

holidays.title: Simón Bolivar Birthday
holidays.description: Commemorate Simon Bolivar birthday on July 24 and appreciate the influential South American leader’s political achievements.

holidays.title: Tell An Old Joke Day
holidays.description: Jog your memory about all the old jokes you know and let rip!

holidays.title: Alexis Ryan’s Birthday
holidays.description: At just 15, this YouTube and TikTok star has tasted fame from an early age.

holidays.title: Amelia Earhart’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s honor the legendary Amelia Earhart, the first female pilot to fly alone across the Atlantic.

holidays.title: Casie Colson Baker’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a ball of sunshine and the apple of her father’s eye.

holidays.title: Jennifer Lopez’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star has achieved many things, and it doesn't look like she is stopping anytime soon.

holidays.title: Mara Wilson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This well-established actress and writer knows how to use the right words to get success.
